title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Course ContentsMarkets and Market Making; Inventory Models; Information Based Models; Strategic Trader Models (Informed and Uninformed Traders); Information and the Price Process; Market Viability and Stability; Liquidity and Relationship between Different Markets; Issues in Market Reforms.
